title: Sesame seed salmon with mirin
description: A deliciously simple way to cook a salmon fillet - sweetened with rice wine and sesame then pan-fried.

show.b01nd35k: Nigel Slater's Dish of the Day

steps: Marinate the salmon in a bowl with the mirin, groundnut and sesame oils for 30 minutes.
Fill a plate with sesame seeds and place the salmon flesh-side down to cover evenly.
Pan-fry the salmon for six minutes skin-side down and then turn for three final minutes of cooking.
